Objective.Descr: Exercise the prop lever for run-up

Step.Descr: Increase throttle to set RPM to 1600
Pull back the Prop Lever fully
Push the Prop Lever back to full RPM
Bring throttle back down to idle
Set the Prop Lever Full Forward

SimMission.PropertyTrigger.ReversePolishCondition: (A:GENERAL ENG RPM:1, rpm) 1590 > (A:GENERAL ENG RPM:1, rpm) 1690 < and
(A:PLANE ALT ABOVE GROUND, meter) (A:STATIC CG TO GROUND, meter) + 10 >
(A:GENERAL ENG THROTTLE LEVER POSITION:1, Percent) 69 < (A:GENERAL ENG THROTTLE LEVER POSITION:1, Percent) 62 > and
(A:GENERAL ENG RPM:1, rpm) 2100 > (A:GENERAL ENG RPM:1, rpm) 2300 < and
(A:GENERAL ENG RPM:1, rpm) 1780 > (A:GENERAL ENG RPM:1, rpm) 1890 < and
